typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		AccountId as integer,
		Name as string,
		Currency as string,
		Status as string,
		Created as long,
		Modified as long,
		Type as string,
		SourceId as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> AccountStage
source(output(
		AccountStatusId as short,
		Name as string,
		DisplayName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> AccountStatus
source(output(
		AccountTypeId as short,
		Name as string,
		DisplayName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> AccountType
source(output(
		CurrencyId as short,
		Name as string,
		DisplayName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Currency
JoinType, AccountStatus join(Status == AccountStatus@Name,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinStatus
JoinCurrency, AccountType join(Type == AccountType@Name,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinType
AccountStage, Currency join(Currency == Currency@Name,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinCurrency
JoinStatus select(mapColumn(
		AccountId,
		Name = AccountStage@Name,
		Created,
		Modified,
		SourceId,
		CurrencyId,
		AccountTypeId,
		AccountStatusId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectAccountColumns
SelectAccountColumns derive(Modified = toTimestamp(Modified, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),
		Created = toTimestamp(Created, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),
		SourceId = 1,
		CurrencyId = toInteger(CurrencyId),
		TypeId = toInteger(AccountTypeId),
		StatusId = toInteger(AccountStatusId)) ~> PrepareColumns
PrepareColumns sink(input(
		AccountId as integer,
		SourceId as integer,
		DisplayName as string,
		Name as string,
		CurrencyId as integer,
		Created as timestamp,
		Modified as timestamp,
		StatusId as integer,
		TypeId as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		AccountId,
		SourceId,
		Name,
		CurrencyId,
		Created,
		Modified,
		StatusId,
		TypeId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> IngestIntoAccount

source(output(
		AdvertismentId as integer,
		Name as string,
		Status as string,
		AdvertismentGroup as string,
		Headline as string,
		IntroductionText as string,
		Url as string,
		Line as string,
		SponsoredUpdateType as string,
		CampaignId as string,
		Type as string,
		Created as long,
		Modified as long,
		DSCName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> AdvertismentStage
source(output(
		AdvertismentTypeId as short,
		Name as string,
		DisplayName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> AdvertismentType
source(output(
		AdvertismentStatusId as short,
		Name as string,
		DisplayName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> AdvertismentStatus
JoinStatus, AdvertismentType join(Type == AdvertismentType@Name,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinType
AdvertismentStage, AdvertismentStatus join(Status == AdvertismentStatus@Name,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinStatus
JoinType select(mapColumn(
		AdvertismentId,
		Name = AdvertismentStage@Name,
		AdvertismentGroup,
		Headline,
		IntroductionText,
		Url,
		Line,
		SponsoredUpdateType,
		CampaignId,
		Created,
		Modified,
		DSCName,
		AdvertismentStatusId,
		AdvertismentTypeId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectAdvertismentColumns
SelectAdvertismentColumns derive(Created = toTimestamp(Created, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),
		Modified = toTimestamp(Modified, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),
		CampaignId = replace(CampaignId, 'urn:li:sponsoredCampaign:', '')) ~> PrepareAdvertismentCoumns
PrepareAdvertismentCoumns sink(input(
		AdvertismentId as integer,
		Name as string,
		AdvertismentGroupId as integer,
		StatusId as integer,
		Headline as string,
		IntroductionText as string,
		Url as string,
		Line as string,
		SponsoredUpdateType as string,
		DSCName as string,
		CampaignId as integer,
		TypeId as integer,
		Created as timestamp,
		Modified as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		AdvertismentId,
		Name,
		AdvertismentGroupId = AdvertismentGroup,
		StatusId = AdvertismentStatusId,
		Headline,
		IntroductionText,
		Url,
		Line,
		SponsoredUpdateType,
		DSCName,
		CampaignId,
		TypeId = AdvertismentTypeId,
		Created,
		Modified
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> Advertisment

source(output(
		SerialNumber as long,
		AccountingCurrencyAmount as decimal(18,0),
		Clients as string,
		Department as integer,
		CurrencyCode as string,
		Employee as string,
		MainAccountId as integer,
		Customer as string,
		TransactionCurrencyCode as string,
		TransDate as string,
		ClassDim as string,
		Project as string,
		Text as string,
		ReportingCurrencyAmount as decimal(18,0),
		SPV as string,
		TransactionCurrencyAmount as decimal(18,0),
		Vendor as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> BudgetServicesStage
BudgetServicesStage derive(TransDate = toTimestamp(replace(TransDate,' +00:00',''), 'MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss')) ~> PrepareColumns
PrepareColumns sink(input(
		SerialNumber as long,
		AccountingCurrencyAmount as decimal(18,0),
		Clients as string,
		DepartmentId as integer,
		CurrencyCode as string,
		Employee as string,
		MainAccountId as integer,
		Customer as string,
		TransactionCurrencyCode as string,
		TransactionDate as timestamp,
		ClassDim as string,
		ProjectId as integer,
		Text as string,
		ReportingCurrencyAmount as decimal(18,0),
		SPV as string,
		TransactionCurrencyAmount as decimal(18,0),
		Vendor as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		SerialNumber,
		AccountingCurrencyAmount,
		Clients,
		DepartmentId = Department,
		CurrencyCode,
		Employee,
		MainAccountId,
		Customer,
		TransactionCurrencyCode,
		TransactionDate = TransDate,
		ClassDim,
		ProjectId = Project,
		Text,
		ReportingCurrencyAmount,
		SPV,
		TransactionCurrencyAmount,
		Vendor
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> BudgetServices

source(output(
		CampaignId as integer,
		Name as string,
		DisplayName as string,
		CampaignGroup as string,
		Type as string,
		Status as string,
		CostType as string,
		Objective as string,

		DailyCurrencyCode as string,
		DailyAmount as string

	allowSchemaDrift: true,

	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> CampaignStage
source(output(
		CampaignTypeId as short,
		Name as string,
		DisplayName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> CampaignType
source(output(

		Name as string,
		DisplayName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> CampaignStatus
source(output(
		ObjectiveId as short,
		Name as string,
		DisplayName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Objective
source(output(
		CostTypeId as short,
		Name as string,
		DisplayName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> CostType
source(output(
		CurrencyId as short,
		Name as string,
		DisplayName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Currency
JoinStatus, CampaignType join(Type == CampaignType@Name,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinType
JoinObjective, CampaignStatus join(Status == CampaignStatus@Name,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinStatus
JoinCostType, Objective join(Objective == Objective@Name,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinObjective
JoinUnitCurrency, CostType join(CostType == CostType@Name,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinCostType
CampaignStage, Currency join(UnitCurrencyCode == Currency@Name,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinUnitCurrency
JoinType select(mapColumn(
		CampaignId,
		Name = CampaignStage@Name,
		DisplayName = CampaignStage@DisplayName,
		CampaignGroup,
		Account,
		Created,
		Modified,
		UnitCurrencyCode,
		UnitAmount,
		DailyCurrencyCode,
		DailyAmount,
		UnitCurrencyId = CurrencyId,
		CostTypeId,
		ObjectiveId,
		CampaignStatusID,
		CampaignTypeId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCampaignColumns
SelectCampaignColumns, Currency join(DailyCurrencyCode == Currency@Name,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDailyCurrency
JoinDailyCurrency select(mapColumn(
		CampaignId,
		Name = SelectCampaignColumns@Name,
		DisplayName = SelectCampaignColumns@DisplayName,
		CampaignGroup,
		Account,
		Created,
		Modified,
		UnitAmount,
		DailyAmount,
		UnitCurrencyId,
		CostTypeId,
		ObjectiveId,
		CampaignStatusId = CampaignStatusID,
		CampaignTypeId,
		DailyCurrencyId = CurrencyId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectAllCampaignColumns
SelectAllCampaignColumns derive(CampaignGroupId = replace(CampaignGroup,'urn:li:sponsoredCampaignGroup:',''),
		AccountId = replace(Account, 'urn:li:sponsoredAccount:', ''),
		Created = toTimestamp(Created, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),
		Modified = toTimestamp(Modified, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')) ~> PrepareCampaignColumns
PrepareCampaignColumns sink(input(
		CampaignId as integer,
		Name as string,
		DisplayName as string,
		CampaignGroupId as integer,
		TypeId as integer,
		AccountId as integer,
		StatusId as integer,
		CostTypeId as integer,
		ObjectiveId as integer,
		Created as timestamp,
		Modified as timestamp,
		UnitCurrencyId as integer,
		UnitAmount as double,
		DailyCurrencyId as integer,
		DailyAmount as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		CampaignId,
		Name,
		DisplayName,
		CampaignGroupId,
		TypeId = CampaignTypeId,
		AccountId,
		StatusId = CampaignStatusId,
		CostTypeId,
		ObjectiveId,
		Created,
		Modified,
		UnitCurrencyId,
		UnitAmount,
		DailyCurrencyId,
		DailyAmount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> Campaign
